parameters.name: lcReference
parameters.description: Indicates the LC reference under which the guarantee is to be opened

parameters.name: beneficiaryCustomerId
parameters.description: The customer identifier where the beneficiary is a customer of the bank

parameters.name: expiryDate
parameters.description: The date an agreement such as a credit facility or limit is due to expire

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expacted to get as part of reponse from t24 on every enquiry request.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS
